Octeon PCI Driver Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
__cavium_list_node
__cvm_pci_pko_qmapCore: Octeon PKO port and queue numbers corressponding to Octeon PCI output queues
__seq_params
__sequence
__test_info
__test_stats
__unit_test_stats
_OCTEON_DEVICEThe Octeon device
buffer_tag
cavium_buffer_tEach buffer pool is represented by this structure
cavium_frag_buf_tList to keep track of fragmented buffers in the buffer pool
cavium_ptr_tUse this type to pass buffer address to the driver in ioctls
cn3xxx_config_tStructure to define the configuration for CN38XX/CN58XX Octeon processors
cn3xxx_oq_config_tStructure to define configuration attributes for each Output queue in the CN38XX/CN58XX Octeon processors
cn56xx_config_tStructure to define the configuration for CN56XX Octeon processors
cn56xx_ep_buflist_tCore: Structure used by driver for buffer management in end-point communication
cn56xx_ep_packet_tCore: Structure passed by application to send data to another endpoint
cn56xx_map_data_tStructure used when host driver sets up endpoint-to-endpoint communication between multiple CN56XX devices
cn56xx_oq_config_tStructure to define configuration attributes for each Output queue in the CN56XX Octeon processors
cn56xx_pci_map_hdr_tStructure used by host driver to send identifying information to each Octeon device
cn56xx_pci_map_tStructure used by host driver to pass PCI address map of all Octeon devices
cn63xx_config_tStructure to define the configuration for CN63XX Octeon processors
cn66xx_config_tStructure to define the configuration for CN66XX Octeon processors
cn68xx_config_tStructure to define the configuration for CN68XX Octeon processors
cn6xxx_oq_configStructure to define configuration attributes for each Output queue in the CN63XX & CN68XX Octeon processors
cvm_ddoq_thread
cvm_ddoq_thread_info
cvm_dma_comp_ptr_tCore: Software defined PCI DMA Completion byte pool buffer format
cvm_dma_remote_len_tCore: Format for size of remote data buffer in a PCI DMA component
cvm_dma_remote_ptr_tCore: Address of the host machine are presented to PCI DMA routines in this format
cvm_kthread_t
cvm_oct_comp_ptr_pool_tCore: Structure to manage software defined Completion byte buffer pool
cvm_oct_dev_tCore: Structure that maintains information for the Octeon device in the core driver
cvm_oct_dma_chunk_tCore: The PCI DMA uses instruction chunks to read the DMA instructions posted by the driver
cvm_pci_dma_cmd_tCore: Information about PCI DMA operation
cvm_pci_host_inst_hdr_t
cvm_pci_inst_hdr2_tCore: The (Packet) Instruction Header appears in the format shown below for Octeon
cvm_pci_scatter_resp_tCore: Scatter response information This structure is passed by application when calling a scatter response API
cvmx_oct_pci_dma_inst_hdr_tCore: Hardware defined 64-bit PCI DMA command structure
cvmx_oct_pci_dma_local_ptr_tCore: Hardware defined 64-bit PCI DMA local buffer format
cvmx_pci_inst_irh_tCore: Format of the input request header in an instruction
cvmx_raw_inst_front_tCore: Format of the front data for a raw instruction in the first 24 bytes of the wqe->packet_data or packet ptr when a core gets work from a PCI input port
cvmx_resp_hdr_tCore: Format of the response header in the first 8 bytes of response sent to the host
oct_bufpool_stats_tBuffer pool statistics
oct_cntq_stats_tStatistics for Octeon DMA Counter queues (CNTQ)
oct_ddoq_list_stats_tSystem-wide statistics for DDOQ implementation
oct_ddoq_stats_tEach DDOQ in the system stores its stats in this format
oct_dev_range_tResponse format for a CORE_MEM_MAP instruction
oct_dev_stats_tStatistics table for octeon device
oct_droq_stats_tOutput Queue statistics
oct_iq_stats_tInput Queue statistics
oct_range_val_tOcteon core address range summary
oct_stats_tOcteon device statistics
octeon_buffer_tStructure for passing input and output buffers in the request structure
octeon_bufpool_config_tConfiguration for the driver's buffer pool
octeon_cn3xxx_t
octeon_cn56xx_t
octeon_cn63xx_t
octeon_cn66xx_t
octeon_cn68xx_t
octeon_common_config_tStructure for global configuration attributes that are common across all Octeon processors
octeon_core_mem_rw_tOcteon core memory Read/Write operations from user-application using Octeon BAR1 access provide information in this structure
octeon_core_setup_tStructure used by core driver to send indication that the Octeon application is ready
octeon_dispatch_list_tThe dispatch list structure
octeon_dispatch_tThe dispatch list entry
octeon_dma_ops_tUsed by CNTQ module to register DMA queue interrupt handler, tasklets and statistics routines for each octeon device
octeon_droq_desc_tOcteon descriptor format
octeon_droq_info_tInformation about packet DMA'ed by Octeon
octeon_droq_ops_tUsed by NIC module to register packet handler and to get device information for each octeon device
octeon_droq_tThe Descriptor Ring Output Queue structure
octeon_exhdr_info_tInformation about each of the extra headers added for a 64-byte instruction
octeon_fn_list
octeon_instr_32B_t32-byte instruction format
octeon_instr_64B_t64-byte instruction format
octeon_instr_ih_tInstruction Header in BIG ENDIAN format
octeon_instr_irh_tInput Request Header in BIG ENDIAN format
octeon_instr_queue_tThe instruction (input) queue
octeon_instr_status_tStatus of request as returned by octeon_process_request()
octeon_iq_config_tStructure to define the configuration attributes for each Input queue
octeon_mmioPCI address space mapping information
octeon_module_handler_tStructure passed by kernel application when registering a module with the driver
octeon_pending_entry_tStructure of an entry in pending list
octeon_pending_list_tPending list implementation for each Octeon device
octeon_poll_ops_tStructure passed by kernel application when registering a poll function with the driver
octeon_proc_entry_t
octeon_query_request_tStructure used when querying the status of a pending request
octeon_range_table_tMap of Octeon core memory address to Octeon BAR1 indexed space
octeon_recv_buffer_tPointer to data buffer
octeon_recv_info_tThe first parameter of a dispatch function
octeon_recv_pkt_tReceive Packet format used when dispatching output queue packets with non-raw opcodes
octeon_reg_list
octeon_request_info_tInformation about the request sent to driver by kernel mode applications
octeon_request_mask_tA bit mask describing the response mode, DMA mode, response order and instruction queue to use for a request
octeon_resp_hdr_tResponse Header in BIG ENDIAN format
octeon_response_list_tHead of a response list
octeon_rw_reg_buf_tStructure used to pass register address and values to write/read
octeon_sg_entry_tThe Scatter-Gather List Entry
octeon_soft_instruction_tFormat of a instruction presented to the driver
octeon_soft_request_tInformation about the request sent to driver
octeon_user_request_info_tInformation about the request sent to driver by user-space applications
test_list
test_node
test_pkt
